title: Ideal_Green_Roof_Locations
name: Ideal Green Roof Locations
description: Create a visual map incorporating GIS to assess and determine which areas of Melbourne are suitable for green roof retrofits and show their exact locations.
datasets: Property level energy consumption (modelled on building attributes) - baseline 2011 and business as usual projections 2016-2026
Block level energy consumption (modelled on building attributes) - 2026 projection - business-as-usual scenario
Rooftops with environmental retrofitting opportunities (Rooftop Project)
Cooling and Greening Melbourne Interactive Map
